reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-designed and comfortable, noting it's not itchy and leaves room for layering underneath.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No disappointments
items.body: Really attractive on. So many compliments. Don't let me forget, it's warm and cozy feeling adds to this lovely sweater. I can't wait to wear it again!!! Read more
items.author: Rhonda Lockett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy K
items.body: Soft, true to size. I ordered a medium and it fits really nice the color red is vibrant not dull. Only thing about this material you must make sure the loops do not get caught on any thing. Im ordering 2 more colors!!!! Read more
items.author: Purple poet

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater, fits as expected
items.body: I think I got what I expected from this sweater based on pictures, description and reviewers posts. I should have put on jeans or something but I tried on when I was wearing old ratty shorts so it's probably not the best picture. But if you can get past the shorts, I think it generally fits well, will be comfy for winter and is the color it says it is online! I bought it because I'm pregnant and will be 7 - 8 months when Fall hits (due in November) so I assume I'll need some extra room in the belly area and thought perhaps this sweater will work. I THINK it will but it is slightly form fitting so not sure if I want to risk stretching it out. It will depend on how big I get. When I took the picture I was probably 129 lbs, am 5'4" tall and have a generally proportionate build. I gave the softness a lower score because it isn't soft by any means but it won't leave scratch marks on you either. Plus, most will likely wear something under it so not a big deal. The quality isn't top notch either but you get what you pay for and it will last you through at least a season or two. I suppose if you want to fancy it up you can replace the buttons with higher quality. For me, I'll leave be! Read more
items.author: skoj2020

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful and high quality
items.body: Great sweater!!! High quality for the price! Kept me pretty warm and super soft. Received lots of compliments as well! Read more
items.author: Amy Gatlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Beautiful. Nicer then I thought. Read more
items.author: Valorie J wagner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Concerned about the longevity...
items.body: As you can tell by the photo, this sweater is susceptible to 'pulls'. Right out of the package there were several areas that had to be pulled back into place. This kind of speaks to the overall quality of the piece which I would say is mediocre. There are much higher quality sweaters out there at this price point. The fit is good. It is flattering overall and has a nice shape. Extremely warm and cozy. This has received compliments after one wear which is nice. It does look good. I like the patterns the buttons are in and how it lays out around the neck and down the front. Very unique looking. The coloring is nice as well. I am worried that as I go out in it that it will catch on just about everything and cause pulls. This isn't something that I see lasting a very long time simply because of that. It does look good and it is comfortable, so you will have to know what is important to you. Read more
items.author: B. Hamlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Fit wonderfully. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish sweater
items.body: Such a great sweater!!❤️ Read more
items.author: Debbie B

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, A-khaki, Pumpkin, 13 Red, Apricot, Coffee, 08 Pink, 09 Aicd Blue, 06 Army Green, 15 Blue, 17 Navy Blue, 12 Royal Blue, Yellow, 05 Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
